ygData.subject: Re: Question about multiple characters
ygData.msgSnippet: Doesn t make sense (or seem fair) to have a Real Person have several characters that are all Officers...we decided that the Officer would be only ONE character
ygData.messageBody:
Doesn't make sense (or seem fair) to have a Real Person have several
characters that are all Officers...we decided that the Officer would be only
ONE character per person....and that each person is allowed only TWO
characters to be in the guild...and the Officer character is required to
attend the meetings in person..not the other of the two characters.

hope that makes sense..

One person: two characters allowed in guild...and only one allowed
to be Officer....who is required to attend meetings.

hehe..restated to make more sense..






From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...> on 06/02/99 02:33
PM PDT
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Question about multiple
characters

From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>

That's interesting. I'm gonna talk it out with my guild tonight. How
do you
make that work? My enchanter is a one if the 4 guild generals (
officer ).
Did you guys decide that the new characters have the same rank in
the guild?
Skara de Toxxulia < Elite >

-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Cent [mailto:jcent@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 2:27 PM
To: DeGirolami, Franck
Cc: Eqenchanters (E-mail)
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Question about multiple characters


From: Jason Cent <jcent@...>

Same here....

started a Rogue on Fennon Ro....got to level 6...gave up due
to
crowdedness on the server...

moved over to The Rathe (i know, still crowded)...and
started my
enchanter...am up to 13 now...but last weekend I started a Halfling
Cleric...leveled up to 5 in 2 days...easily.....and got smithing up
to level
15...and not all from guild training either...hehe

I like the option of playing the pure caster (enchanter) OR
the
hybrid class ....

In fact, this came up recently in our guild about playing
more then
one character and having them (all, none, or limit to 2 or 3?) in
the guild
officially....

Fistlebane, Officer of Order of Polaris on Rathe




From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...> on
06/02/99 02:21
PM PDT
To: "Eqenchanters (E-mail)"
<eqenchanters@onelist.com>@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: [eqenchanters] Question about multiple
characters

From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>

How many of you are playing multiple characters at the same
time?
I played first a dark elf necro up to level 16..
my main character is now an enchanter level 20..I've been
playing
her a lot
but since Saturday ( which is when I leveled ) I havent been
fighting at
all, I'm in one of those travelling / meeting people mood.
Anyway, this morning I started a bard...I dont why ...I
completely
gave up
my necro when I started to play my enchanter. I dont want to
do that
this
time, but sometimes I get bored and I need something new...

Skara de Toxxulia
